name: DWC_NAS_LOGIN_OK
description: This error code means the NAS login was successful. It should never be displayed in-game.

name: DWC_NAS_ACCTCREATE_OK
description: This error code means the NAS account create was successful. It should never be displayed in-game.

name: DWC_NAS_SVCLOC_OK
description: This error code means the NAS service locate was successful. It should never be displayed in-game.

name: DWC_NAS_PROFANE_INGAMESN
comment: NAS login returned a profanity error
description: This error code is used internally to signify the NAS login was successful but the in-game screen name contains profanity. The game will display a unique message to the user but will never display this error code.

name: DWC_NAS_CONNECT_ERROR
comment: Failed to connect to the WiiLink WFC server
description: Generic catchall error for connection failures. Check your network connection, restart your console and try again.
Additional note: The DNS method requires launching the game from the disc channel. Attempting to use it elsewhere may result in this error.

name: DWC_NAS_GAMESPY_MAINTENANCE_ERROR
description: WiiLink WFC is undergoing maintenance for this game.

name: DWC_NAS_DEVICE_BANNED_ERROR
comment: Device is banned from Nintendo WFC
description: This error code represents a ban from the original Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection service. This error code has been superseded by 22003 for WiiLink WFC. (Wiimmfi: 23917).

name: DWC_NAS_INVALID_MAC_ERROR
description: Obsolete error code from the original Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection service. The MAC address is no longer used for authentication on WiiLink WFC.

name: DWC_NAS_ACCOUNT_ALREADY_EXISTS_ERROR
comment: Provided authentication info is already in use
description: Failed to create an account on NAS because an account with the provided authentication data already exists. Not used by WiiLink WFC.

name: DWC_NAS_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND_ERROR
comment: Provided authentication info is already in use
description: Failed to login because an account with the provided authentication data does not exist. Not used by WiiLink WFC.

name: DWC_NAS_MAX_PROFILE_COUNT_EXCEEDED_ERROR
comment: Reached maximum number of profiles for one account
description: You've reached the maximum amount of profiles you can create or you are being rate limited.

name: DWC_NAS_INVALID_GAME_ID_ERROR
comment: Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection has been discontinued
description: Your game is not patched for WiiLink WFC.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_STAGE0_MISSING_STAGE1
comment: NAS did not return a proper Stage1 payload
description: Please try again. If the issue persists, try redoing the WiiLink WFC patch.
If you are a developer making your own patch, check that the URL is correct.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_STAGE0_HASH_MISMATCH
comment: NAS returned an incorrect Stage1 payload
description: Please try again. If the issue persists, try redoing the WiiLink WFC patch.
If you are a developer making your own patch, check that your hash is of the correct production Stage1 payload.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_STAGE1_ALLOC
comment: Failed to allocate memory for the payload (local error)
description: This could be a game incompatibility with the WiiLink WFC patch. Please report this issue (alongside info about the game and your patch method) to WiiLink.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_STAGE1_MAKE_REQUEST
comment: Failed to make the payload download request (local error)
description: This generally should not occur, but if it does then try restarting your game.
If you are a developer making your own patch, make sure that you initialized NHTTP with a proper allocator.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_STAGE1_RESPONSE
comment: An error occurred while downloading the payload
description: Most likely a generic connection error. If the error persists, check the WiiLink WFC status at [status.wiilink24.com](https://status.wiilink24.com), or check your network connection and try again.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_STAGE1_HEADER_CHECK
comment: The payload server returned an invalid payload
description: This should not occur. Maybe data was corrupted in transit, or there's a bug in the server or client-side patch.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_STAGE1_LENGTH_ERROR
comment: The downloaded payload exceeds the maximum length
description: This should not occur. Maybe data was corrupted in transit, or there's a bug in the server or client-side patch.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_STAGE1_SALT_MISMATCH
comment: The downloaded payload contains an incorrect salt
description: This should not occur. Maybe data was corrupted in transit, or there's a bug in the server or client-side patch.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_STAGE1_GAME_ID_MISMATCH
comment: The downloaded payload was built for a different game
description: Make sure you applied the patch for the correct revision.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_STAGE1_SIGNATURE_INVALID
comment: The downloaded payload has an incorrect signature
description: This should not occur. Maybe data was corrupted in transit, or there's a bug in the server or client-side patch.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_STAGE1_WAITING
comment: Stage1 (DNS build) is waiting for a response from the payload server
description: This is an internal code that should never reach the end user.

name: WL_ERROR_PAYLOAD_GAME_MISMATCH
comment: This payload was built for a different game
description: Make sure you applied the patch for the correct revision.

name: WWFC_UNKNOWN_LOGIN_ERROR
description: This is more often than not an issue with your dumped console keys (particularly from a Wii U). [This tool from Leseratte](https://forum.wii-homebrew.com/index.php/Thread/59510-Fix-for-error-23934-on-Dolphin/) can be used to fix it.

name: WWFC_DOLPHIN_SETUP_REQUIRED_ERROR
comment: Attempt to login with generic console credentials
description: In order to help prevent ban circumvention, all emulator users are required to dump their retail Wii or Wii U console's keys to verify with. Read more at [wfc.wiilink24.com/dolphin](https://wfc.wiilink24.com/dolphin/).

name: WWFC_PROFILE_BANNED_TOS_ERROR
comment: Console is banned due to a Terms of Service violation
description: You are banned from WiiLink WFC due to a violation of the [Terms of Service](https://wfc.wiilink24.com/tos/). This means you are unable to play online at all on any WiiLink WFC-supported game.

name: WWFC_PROFILE_RESTRICTED_ERROR
comment: Console is restricted due to a WiiLink WFC Rules violation
description: You are banned from public matches due to a violation of the [WiiLink WFC Rules](https://wfc.wiilink24.com/rules/). You may still join private friend rooms (where the host has added you).

name: WWFC_KICKED_ERROR
description: You were either kicked from WiiLink WFC by a moderator, or removed from a friend room by the host. You're welcome to reconnect to WiiLink WFC.

name: WWFC_CONSOLE_MISMATCH_ERROR
comment: Login attempt from an unknown console
description: The console you are using is not the device used to register the profile. If on Dolphin, make sure you've [set up your NAND correctly](https://wfc.wiilink24.com/dolphin/). You may not share profiles between multiple real consoles.

name: WWFC_PROFILE_ID_INVALID
comment: Profile ID is inside a reserved range
description: Profiles created on WiiLink WFC cannot be shared or transferred between third-party instances. Please create a new profile.
If you tried to set your profile ID manually, make sure it's under `1000000000`.

name: WWFC_PROFILE_ID_IN_USE
comment: Profile ID is already in use
description: The profile ID you're trying to register is already in use. Please create a new profile.

name: WWFC_PAYLOAD_VERSION_INVALID
comment: The payload version is outdated or invalid
description: If you're using a generic WiiLink WFC patch, you may have left your game open too long! Try restarting your game so WiiLink WFC can apply the latest patches.
If you're using a non-standard patch method, such as a game mod, you may need to update the mod. If you're on the latest version, contact the mod author about the error.

name: WWFC_INVALID_ELO_ERROR
comment: Save data contains an invalid ELO value
description: Your VR and/or BR value is set to an invalid value (must be within 1 and 9999). Please fix your save data and reconnect.

name: DWC_NAS_LOGIN_HTTP_ERROR
comment: HTTP error returned from NAS login request

name: DWC_NAS_SVCLOC_HTTP_ERROR
comment: HTTP error returned from NAS svcloc request

name: DWC_WIFI_ID_NAND_FULL
comment: Cannot save Wi-Fi ID to NAND because it's full

name: DWC_WIFI_ID_NAND_CORRUPTED
comment: Cannot save Wi-Fi ID to NAND because it's damaged

name: DWC_SEQ_GENERIC_ERROR
comment: Error during gameplay or other operation

name: DWC_GDB_INVALID_NUM_RECORDIDS
comment: SAKE invalid number of record IDs

name: DWC_GS_INVALID_PROFILE_ID
description: Your profile was created with a different server. Please read the following steps based on your console:
## Nintendo DS / DSi Games

You will need to erase your Nintendo WFC Configuration. This will not affect your save data. To do this, go to the Nintendo WFC settings in the game's online menu, select "Options", then select "Erase Nintendo WFC Configuration".
Your console will then restart. After that, enter the game again and reconfigure your connection settings.
## Wii Games

This error code will usually only occur if you are using the DNS method to play online. The solution is generally to reset your in-game profile (such as your license in Mario Kart Wii), which is less than ideal. If you don't want to do that, the following methods can be used to connect online using an old profile:

1. Some games such as Mario Kart Wii support multiple profiles. If you can clear one profile, you can use that to allow your old profile back online. Simply connect online using the new profile and navigate through the menus to begin searching for players.

- Then, immediately back out and switch to your old profile. The WiiLink WFC patches will be applied by this point and you should be able to play online with your old profile. This process only needs to be done once.

2. If you have a softmodded Wii or are willing to softmod your Wii, you can use the [dedicated homebrew app](https://wfc.wiilink24.com/launcher) to launch the game with patches instead. This will automatically allow you to play online with your old profile.
- Once you connect, the server will know your profile and you can connect using the DNS method from then on.

name: DWC_GS_NETWORK_FAILURE
description: Lost connection to the server. If the error persists, check your network connection and try again.

name: DWC_GS_SERVER_DOWN
description: Unable to communicate with the server. If the error persists, check the WiiLink WFC status at [status.wiilink24.com](https://status.wiilink24.com), or check your network connection and try again.

name: DWC_GS_DNS_FAILURE
description: Unable to resolve the server's IP address. If the error persists, check your DNS settings and network connection and try again.

name: DWC_GS_INVALID_DATA
description: Received invalid data from the server. Check the WiiLink WFC status at [status.wiilink24.com](https://status.wiilink24.com).

name: DWC_GS_SOCKET_COMMUNICATION_ERROR
description: Error communicating on a socket. If the error persists, try restarting your game.

name: DWC_GS_SOCKER_BIND_ERROR
description: Error binding on a socket. If the error persists, try restarting your game.

name: DWC_GS_TIMED_OUT
description: The server took too long to respond. If the error persists, check the WiiLink WFC status at [status.wiilink24.com](https://status.wiilink24.com), or check your network connection and try again.

name: DWC_GS_PEER_CONNECTION_FAILED
description: Failed to connect to the other player. If the error persists, check your network connection and try again.

name: DWC_GS_SERVER_FULL
description: The server is full. Please wait a moment and try again later.

name: DWC_GS_STATS_LOGIN_FAILED
description: Failed to log in to the GameStats server.

name: DWC_GS_NOT_MUTUAL_FRIENDS
comment: The other party is not a friend

name: DWC_GS_PEER_CLOSED_CONNECTION
comment: The other party closed the connection

name: DWC_GS_NATNEG_FAILURE
comment: Exceeded maximum allowed NAT negotiation attempts
description: Failed to connect through your (or the other player's) network firewall. If the error persists, this may be due to an unstable network connection, or an unsupported NAT type.
If you are able to access your router's settings:
- Try port forwarding 22xxx to your console's IP address, where xxx is the last three digits of your console serial number (including the digit in the square).
- Or try enabling UPnP (Universal Plug and Play), or DMZ (Demilitarized Zone) for your console's IP address.
Otherwise:
- Try using a different network connection, or your mobile data connection if possible.
- Sometimes VPNs can increase (or decrease) network stability. Try using a VPN if you have one available. If you are already using a VPN, try disabling it.

name: DWC_GS_SINGLE_NATNEG_FAILURE
comment: Failed to NAT negotiate with the other player
description: Failed to connect through your (or the other player's) network firewall. If the error persists, this may be due to an unstable network connection, or an unsupported NAT type.
If you are able to access your router's settings:
- Try port forwarding 22xxx to your console's IP address, where xxx is the last three digits of your console serial number (including the digit in the square).
- Or try enabling UPnP (Universal Plug and Play), or DMZ (Demilitarized Zone) for your console's IP address.
Otherwise:
- Try using a different network connection, or your mobile data connection if possible.
- Sometimes VPNs can increase (or decrease) network stability. Try using a VPN if you have one available. If you are already using a VPN, try disabling it.

name: DWC_GS_RECV_INVALID_STATE
comment: Data received in invalid receive state

name: DWC_GS_RECV_BUFFER_OVERFLOW
comment: Buffer overflow caused by received data

name: DWC_GS_CONN_ALREADY_CLOSED
comment: Attempted to close an already closed connection

name: DWC_GS_GT2_SOCKET_ERROR
comment: GameSpy GT2 socket error caused by SO error

name: DWC_GS_UNEXPECTED_STATE
comment: Unexpected state or unknown Gamespy error

name: WCC_DELETE_ERROR
description: This error is usually caused by corrupted save data.

name: WCC_MISC_WC24_ERROR
description: An unknown WiiConnect24 error occurred. Try reinstalling the patch.

name: WCC_FILESYSTEM_ERROR
comment: Error mounting the virtual FAT filesystem
description: This error is usually caused by corrupted save data (VFF file).

name: WCC_TASK_ERROR
description: This error is usually caused by corrupted save data (VFF file).

name: WCC_INVALID_DATA
description: The downloaded data cannot be used. This may be caused by an incorrect date and time setting, an outdated patch, corrupted save data, or a server-side issue. Check the WiiLink server status at [status.wiilink24.com](https://status.wiilink24.com).

name: WCC_INTERNAL_ERROR
description: An unknown internal error occurred. This may be due to corrupted save data, or a server-side issue. Check the WiiLink server status at [status.wiilink24.com](https://status.wiilink24.com).

name: HTTP_UNAUTHORIZED
description: Possibly caused by a conflicting Wiimmfi and WiiLink WFC patch. Make sure you're not using the WiiLink WFC code on top of a Wiimmfi patched game.
